entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:46 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 10:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 10:11 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
